text: Kyjov is a town in the Czech Republic. About 11 548 people live there (2012). It is in the southeast of the historical region Moravia. It was first mentioned in 1126 in a chronicle. == Sister cities == * Yvetot, France * Hollabrunn, Austria == Other websites == *Kyjov webpage Category:Towns in the Czech Republic Category:South Moravian Region
title: Kyjov
